turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Would you get a coffee order ready for pick up for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Where are you wanting to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on Pepper St. please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Something with Cinnamon sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you looking for a hot or cold drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cold, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can i suggest the Cinnamon Shortbread Frappuccino ? It's currently being featured.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good. Can I get that with heavy cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll check. (pause) Yes, I can order it with heavy cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent! And can you add chocolate syrup to the whip cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Making those changes now. What size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Venti please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One Venti Cinnamon Shortbread, with heavy cream, and chocolate syrup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good, I would like 2 of those.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else on the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, a Venti vanilla creme frappuccino, heavy cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will add that to the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, are those Cinnamon Shortbread frappuccinos available as Creme frapps?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, they are. Would you like me to change your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. Just those three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Your order for two venti Cinnamon Shortbread Creme Frappuccinos with heavy creme and chocolate syrup, and one venti vanilla creme frappuccino will be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Is there anything else I can help with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That's all for now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a wonderful day. Good-bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good-bye.
